results.content:
It was a good match for me: covered basics of DOM manipulation, provided lot of practice. I apreciated that lessons are quick and without excessive time-consuming talking. However few times I felt I needed some more explanation about the nature of methods we were using (but it's ok because you can always google).
Overall I would recommend this course and I do not regret taking it. Laurence is a great instructor.

response.content: Thank you for taking the course, glad you are enjoying it :) Please let me know anytime if you have any questions I'd be happy to hear from you.
